setting.name: Validate Source Text
setting.description: Run a basic USFM validation check on the incoming source text.

setting.name: Current Component
setting.description: The current (perhaps more accurately the previously processed) component.

setting.name: Component Renderer
setting.description: The render for this kind of component. The value must correspond with a Rapuma method written for this specific renderer.

setting.name: Source Editor
setting.description: The editor the source text comes from.

setting.name: Preprocess Script
setting.description: The name of a script (only one) that will be used for preprocessing this type of component.

setting.name: Post Process Scripts
setting.description: A list of a scripts that can be used for a varity of postprocessing on this type of component.

setting.name: Use Component Preprocess Script
setting.description: Use preprocessing script on incoming component text.
